com.webcm.dao

Class ContactDAOImpl

  • Object
    • ContactDAOImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContactDAO

    @Repository
public class ContactDAOImpl
extends Object
implements ContactDAO
    DAO layer implementation for Contact entity Implementation of the required methods for communication with the database and perfoming all the neccessary operations
    Version:
    1.0, 26.04.2017.
    Author:
    Ivor Šoš - ivor.sos@gmail.com

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContactDAOImpl() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteContact(long theId)
      Removes the specified Contact entry from the database Retrieves the current session, uses Hibernate get() method on the required class object to retrieve the object based on ID and finally removes the entry from the database.
      Contact getContact(long theId)
      Retrieves specified Contact object from the database Retrieves the current session and uses Hibernate get() method on the required class object using parameter ID to specify the object.
      List<Contact> getContacts()
      Retrieves all the Contact entries from the database in a List format Retrieves the current session, creates the query and puts the query result list in the return object, the Contact list.
      List<Sex> getSexList()
      Retrieves all the Sex entries from the database in a List format Retrieves the current session, creates the query and puts the query result list in the return object, the Sex list.
      void saveContact(Contact newContact)
      Saves the attribute Contact into the database Retrieves the current session and uses Hibernate saveOrUpdate() method on the parameter Contact object.

    • Method Detail

      • getContacts

        public List<Contact> getContacts()
        Retrieves all the Contact entries from the database in a List format Retrieves the current session, creates the query and puts the query result list in the return object, the Contact list.
        Specified by:
        getContacts in interface ContactDAO
        Returns:
        The List of Contact objects.

      • getContact

        public Contact getContact(long theId)
        Retrieves specified Contact object from the database Retrieves the current session and uses Hibernate get() method on the required class object using parameter ID to specify the object.
        Specified by:
        getContact in interface ContactDAO
        Parameters:
        theId - ID for the required Contact
        Returns:
        The requested Contact object

      • saveContact

        public void saveContact(Contact newContact)
        Saves the attribute Contact into the database Retrieves the current session and uses Hibernate saveOrUpdate() method on the parameter Contact object. Both Save and Update on an object called by the controller are processed in this method. Hibernate has implemented logic that checks for existing ID, if it exists Update is called, if not Save is called.
        Specified by:
        saveContact in interface ContactDAO
        Parameters:
        newContact - The Contact object that needs to be saved

      • deleteContact

        public void deleteContact(long theId)
        Removes the specified Contact entry from the database Retrieves the current session, uses Hibernate get() method on the required class object to retrieve the object based on ID and finally removes the entry from the database.
        Specified by:
        deleteContact in interface ContactDAO
        Parameters:
        theId - ID of the Contact object to be deleted

      • getSexList

        public List<Sex> getSexList()
        Retrieves all the Sex entries from the database in a List format Retrieves the current session, creates the query and puts the query result list in the return object, the Sex list.
        Specified by:
        getSexList in interface ContactDAO
        Returns:
        The List of Sex objects
